-- in --
package test

templ script(data string) {
	<script>
		var a = {{ data }}
		var b = "{{ data }}"
		var c = '{{ data }}'
		var d = `{{ data }}`
	</script>
}

-- out --
package test

templ script(data string) {
	<script>
		var a = {{ data }}
		var b = "{{ data }}"
		var c = '{{ data }}'
		var d = `{{ data }}`
	</script>
}
